alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 10 at 9:33PM CDT until May 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN ELLIS...ROGER MILLS...NORTHWESTERN HARMON...NORTHWESTERN GREER AND WESTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 933 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of Durham to 5 miles north of Sweetwater to near Texola to 4 miles southeast of Quail, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Erick, Reydon, Sweetwater, Strong City, Texola, Crawford, Roll, Durham, Madge, Berlin and Dempsey. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
